scenes.description: Mori Calliope talks to the audience, showing off the 3D desert environment and her custom microphone.

subtitles.original: よろしくお願いします！ うおっ！
subtitles.english: Please look after me! Woah!

subtitles.original: Hey hey! Hold on, I think this is my normal hand. Oh!
subtitles.english: Hey hey! Hold on, I think this is my normal hand. Oh!

subtitles.original: Alright, I'm gonna get some good reactions for you guys.
subtitles.english: Alright, I'm gonna get some good reactions for you guys.

subtitles.english: Hold on a sec.

subtitles.english: I'm being silly 'cause I need time to chill right now.

subtitles.english: And my face... my face looks good too.

subtitles.original: but you might have to edit it later.

subtitles.original: from the "Let's Get It Crashed" MV.

subtitles.original: Um, and then, well, you Deadbeats,
subtitles.english: Um, and then, well, you Deadbeats,

subtitles.original: you're all on your way to the next stage, so you're not there yet.
subtitles.english: you're all on your way to the next stage, so you're not there yet.

subtitles.english: Um, but let me show you my mic...

subtitles.english: This is the special Mori Calliope mic

subtitles.english: I'm obsessed with it.

subtitles.english: So, anyway, that's what's going on, Deadbeats.

subtitles.english: I wanted to show you the actual future of Hololive.

subtitles.english: You guys want to see some more songs?

subtitles.english: Oh, also, buy the album!

subtitles.english: I'm all bent out of shape. I feel like MCs...

subtitles.english: I'm like good when it's an actual live, like in a venue,

subtitles.original: but then if it's like this, I screw up a lot, so... oh well.
subtitles.english: but then if it's like this, I screw up a lot, so... oh well.

subtitles.english: so I'll have to talk to her about it later. Welcome to the future!

subtitles.english: Anyway, Deadbeats... I gotta do a quick costume change and scene change.

subtitles.english: and... be up with you hither and thither...

subtitles.english: that's probably the wrong word to use in that situation.

subtitles.english: But thank you, Saps-san!

subtitles.original: Alright, I'll catch you guys there.

subtitles.original: Time for a... 変身！ 行くぞ！
subtitles.english: Time for a... Transformation! Let's go!

subtitles.original: Golden Buddy / アンバランスを解いた
subtitles.english: Golden Buddy / Unbalanced Resolved

subtitles.original: 確かな物語に
subtitles.english: In a certain story,

subtitles.original: 勝ち獲るアイデンティティ
subtitles.english: identity is won.

subtitles.original: 荒れ狂った手応え
subtitles.english: The raging feedback,

subtitles.original: 自信を変え
subtitles.english: transforming confidence,

subtitles.original: 時に伴う さあ 激昂
subtitles.english: accompanying the times, come on, fury!

subtitles.original: 感情はノンフィクションで喜怒哀楽
subtitles.english: Emotions are non-fiction, joy, anger, grief, and pleasure.

subtitles.original: 一心同体 災禍さの勝負
subtitles.english: Two bodies, one soul, a battle in the calamity.

subtitles.original: 失敗も 正解も 味わえ
subtitles.english: Savor both failure and the right answer.

subtitles.original: One and only Golden Buddy
subtitles.english: One and only Golden Buddy

subtitles.original: 意味なんてないような世界で
subtitles.english: In a world that seems to have no meaning,

subtitles.original: 偶然重なった光
subtitles.english: light that happened to overlap.

subtitles.original: 脈打つ鼓動
subtitles.english: Pulsing heartbeat,

subtitles.original: 誰にもなれない
subtitles.english: becoming someone no one else can be,

subtitles.original: 言葉を紡いでゆく
subtitles.english: continuing to spin words.

subtitles.original: 運命じゃないよ
subtitles.english: It's not destiny,

subtitles.original: 小さな勇気と辿り着く
subtitles.english: I'll arrive with a little courage.

subtitles.original: 強気に解き合み行く
subtitles.english: Strongly unraveling and moving forward,

subtitles.original: ハートをセッション
subtitles.english: heart session,

subtitles.original: 2人ならやれるさ
subtitles.english: if it's the two of us, we can do it!

subtitles.original: Back to back no matter what
subtitles.english: Back to back no matter what

subtitles.original: ぶちまけるスペルで飛ばす Spark
subtitles.english: Sending out sparks with spells to be poured out.

subtitles.original: 段違いで研ぎ澄ませた Pass
subtitles.english: A pass sharpened to a different level.

subtitles.original: 誰も邪魔できないこの Route
subtitles.english: No one can interfere with this route.

subtitles.original: サン・ニ・イチ・ゼロ
subtitles.english: Three, two, one, zero.

subtitles.original: 2人でお宝攫うさ
subtitles.english: The two of us will snatch the treasure.

subtitles.original: ウザいくらい遠くに放とう
subtitles.english: Let's release it as far as it can be annoying.

subtitles.original: 地獄から奏でるぜ Loop
subtitles.english: Playing from hell, a loop.

subtitles.original: イメージの合図 どこまでも
subtitles.english: The signal of an image, anywhere.

subtitles.original: 無限に 荒れ果て道じゃない
subtitles.english: It's not a path that's infinitely desolate.

subtitles.original: 言葉の道を突き進む クラウド
subtitles.english: Pushing through the path of words, cloud.

subtitles.original: 才能を産む ロケーション
subtitles.english: A location that gives birth to talent.

subtitles.original: どうせなら ぐちゃぐちゃにしてやれ
subtitles.english: If anything, make it a mess.

subtitles.original: 始めてのなら やりきる覚悟を
subtitles.english: If it's the first time, have the resolve to see it through.

subtitles.original: 敗者と勝者のデュエット
subtitles.english: A duet of the loser and the winner.

subtitles.original: 弾き出した不条理のクズ
subtitles.english: Scum of the absurdity that was flipped out.

subtitles.original: 振り払え Don't stop me
subtitles.english: Shake it off, don't stop me.

subtitles.original: 心の死は 消えない
subtitles.english: The death of the heart won't vanish.

subtitles.original: 2人ならやれるさ
subtitles.english: If it's the two of us, we can do it!
